name: Find Me (Skruffye)
description:
Use the mouse to find and click the only pair of eyes hidden in the darkness among a sea of their singular brethren. Be careful though, not all adjacent eyes are paired.

Find me, before I find you, but don't rush--the sound of a mis-click will lead me straight to you.

(Font: "You Murderer BB" by Blambot, Freeware, Non-Commercial License)
